actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 451 of the Tariff Act of 1930 so as to exempt certain private aircraft entering or departing from the United States and Canada at night or on Sunday or a holiday from provisions requiring payment to the United States for overtime services of customs officers and employees and to treat snowmobiles as highway vehicles for the purposes of such section.

summary.text: Exempts private aircraft entering or departing from the United States and Canada at night or on Sunday or a holiday from provisons requiring payment to the United States for overtime services of customs officers and employees. (Amends 19 U.S.C. 1451)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 451 of the Tariff Act of 1930 so as to exempt certain private aircraft entering or departing from the United States and Canada at night or on Sunday or a holiday from provisions requiring payment to the United States for overtime services of customs officers and employees and to treat snowmobiles as highway vehicles for the purposes of such section.
